text: Microsoft may terminate this Agreement at any time without cause upon [*] ([*]) days prior written notice.
This Agreement may be terminated by ArTara upon thirty (30) days prior written notice to University.
In addition, either you or Nationwide may terminate this Agreement<omitted>for any reason on at least ninety (90) days written notice to the other party.

NEITHER PARTY SHALL HAVE ANY LIABILITY TO THE OTHER PARTY FOR ANY LOST PROFITS OR SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, EVEN IF SUCH PARTY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
The term of this Agreement shall continue for one (1) year following the Launch Date, unless earlier terminated as provided herein.
